explatoms.drawing¶

Functions

get_circle_draw_callback(circle_number)

Retrieve a Gtk.DrawingArea::draw callback that draws a given number of circles.
explatoms.drawing.DrawCallback¶

A Gtk.DrawingArea::draw callback.

alias of Callable[[gi.repository.Gtk.DrawingArea, cairo.Context, tuple[float, float, float]], None]

explatoms.drawing.__draw_circle(context: cairo.Context, x: int, y: int, color: tuple[float, float, float]) → None¶

Draw a circle at given coordinates using given context.

Parameters

  • context (cairo.Context) – Cairo context.

  • x (int) – An x coordinate.

  • y (int) – An y coordinate.

  • color (colors.Color) – A color in which to draw.

Return type

None

explatoms.drawing.__draw_one(area: gi.repository.Gtk.DrawingArea, context: cairo.Context, color: tuple[float, float, float]) → None¶

Draw one circle in a drawing area.

Parameters

  • area (Gtk.DrawingArea) – The drawing area.

  • context (cairo.Context) – Cairo context.

  • color (colors.Color) – A color in which to draw.

Return type

None

explatoms.drawing.__draw_three(area: gi.repository.Gtk.DrawingArea, context: cairo.Context, color: tuple[float, float, float]) → None¶

Draw three circles in a drawing area.

  • context (cairo.Context) – Cairo context.

  • color (colors.Color) – A color in which to draw.

explatoms.drawing.__get_drawing_area_size(area: gi.repository.Gtk.DrawingArea) → tuple[int, int]¶

Retrieve the width and the height of a drawing area.

Parameters

area (Gtk.DrawingArea) – The drawing area.

Returns

The width and the height of the drawing area.

Return type

tuple[int, int]

explatoms.drawing.get_circle_draw_callback(circle_number: int) → Callable[[gi.repository.Gtk.DrawingArea, cairo.Context, tuple[float, float, float]], None]¶

Retrieve a Gtk.DrawingArea::draw callback that draws a given number of circles.

Parameters

circle_number (int) – A number of circles to be drawn, in range 1-3.

Returns

A Gtk.DrawingArea::draw callback or None if circle_number is not in range 1-3.

Return type

DrawCallback or None
